name: Tsumo Shot
description:
Tsumo Shot is a 2D local multiplayer arena fighting game. There are cannons, disappearing platforms, and more! The objective of the game is to be the last sumo standing!

Controls:

Move: Left analog stick

Jump: A

Punch: X

Parachute: Y

Credits:

Programming: Max Lubbers / Ryan Staudacher / Clayton Miller

UI: Clayton Miller

Art: Eric Clayton

Background Music: Epic Chinese Music - Kung Fu by Derek & Brandon Fiechter
